page.title: 08The Hairy Hands of Dartmoor
page.content: One of the legends on Dartmoor is the legend of the Hairy Hands.The legend begins in the early 1920s on a stretch of road between Two Bridges and Postbridge.A man was riding his motorbike with his two children in the sidecar.When suddenly two huge hairy hands took hold of the handle bars and drove the motorbike off the road.The man was killed but his two chidren survived the crash.About a month later on the same stretch of road a man was speeding along showing off his new car when the same two hands which had taken control of the motorbike grabbed the steering wheel and ran the car off the road.The man suffered almost fatal injuries.The hairy hands have not been seen since a lady showed them the Holy Cross as they entered her caravan.
